title: The camera needs permission, but I cannot find the Omnibar
body:
**Describe the bug**
No way to accept the camera permission

**Expected behavior**
Have a way to click and accept the camera permission request.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/10012763/63f3ffc3-cd2e-4bc5-8551-f4a9d7ed481c)


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux
 - Installation package [deb]
 - Version [1.3.13]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
